title: 공복혈당 - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.
Cappuccio, F. P., D’Elia, L., Strazzullo, P., & Miller, M. A. (2010). Sleep duration and all-cause mortality. Sleep, 33(5), 585–592.
content: 정제탄수화물, 설탕, 단 음료 줄이고 식이섬유·단백질 위주 식사. 일정한 시간에 3끼 섭취.

title: 공복혈당 - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.
Cappuccio, F. P., D’Elia, L., Strazzullo, P., & Miller, M. A. (2010). Sleep duration and all-cause mortality. Sleep, 33(5), 585–592.
content: 유산소운동(하루 30분 brisk walk 이상), 식후 1시간 내 가벼운 활동.

title: 공복혈당 - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.
Cappuccio, F. P., D’Elia, L., Strazzullo, P., & Miller, M. A. (2010). Sleep duration and all-cause mortality. Sleep, 33(5), 585–592.
content: 일정한 수면패턴 유지, 스트레스 시 과식 피하기.

title: 공복혈당 - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.
Cappuccio, F. P., D’Elia, L., Strazzullo, P., & Miller, M. A. (2010). Sleep duration and all-cause mortality. Sleep, 33(5), 585–592.
content: 음주·흡연 모두 혈당 변동성 높임 — 금연, 절주 필수.

title: LDL/총콜레스테롤 - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.
Cappuccio, F. P., D’Elia, L., Strazzullo, P., & Miller, M. A. (2010). Sleep duration and all-cause mortality. Sleep, 33(5), 585–592.
content: 포화지방(붉은 고기, 버터) 줄이고, 불포화지방(등푸른생선, 견과류) 섭취. 식이섬유 충분히.

title: LDL/총콜레스테롤 - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.
Cappuccio, F. P., D’Elia, L., Strazzullo, P., & Miller, M. A. (2010). Sleep duration and all-cause mortality. Sleep, 33(5), 585–592.
content: 유산소운동(주 150분 이상), 체중감소 5~10%만으로도 개선.

title: LDL/총콜레스테롤 - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.
Cappuccio, F. P., D’Elia, L., Strazzullo, P., & Miller, M. A. (2010). Sleep duration and all-cause mortality. Sleep, 33(5), 585–592.
content: 스트레스는 코르티솔↑ → 지질대사 악화, 명상·심호흡 권장.

title: LDL/총콜레스테롤 - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.
Cappuccio, F. P., D’Elia, L., Strazzullo, P., & Miller, M. A. (2010). Sleep duration and all-cause mortality. Sleep, 33(5), 585–592.
content: 흡연은 HDL↓, 절주로 간 대사 부담 줄이기.

title: HDL 낮음 - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.
Cappuccio, F. P., D’Elia, L., Strazzullo, P., & Miller, M. A. (2010). Sleep duration and all-cause mortality. Sleep, 33(5), 585–592.
content: 견과류, 등푸른 생선, 올리브유 섭취 늘리기. 트랜스지방(과자, 튀김) 금지.

title: HDL 낮음 - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.
Cappuccio, F. P., D’Elia, L., Strazzullo, P., & Miller, M. A. (2010). Sleep duration and all-cause mortality. Sleep, 33(5), 585–592.
content: 중강도 유산소+근력운동 병행, 꾸준한 습관 중요.

title: HDL 낮음 - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.
Cappuccio, F. P., D’Elia, L., Strazzullo, P., & Miller, M. A. (2010). Sleep duration and all-cause mortality. Sleep, 33(5), 585–592.
content: 수면 부족 시 HDL 감소 — 최소 6시간 이상 숙면 권장.

title: HDL 낮음 - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.
Cappuccio, F. P., D’Elia, L., Strazzullo, P., & Miller, M. A. (2010). Sleep duration and all-cause mortality. Sleep, 33(5), 585–592.
content: 금연 시 HDL 10%↑, 절주 유지.

title: 트리글리세라이드 - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.
Cappuccio, F. P., D’Elia, L., Strazzullo, P., & Miller, M. A. (2010). Sleep duration and all-cause mortality. Sleep, 33(5), 585–592.
content: 단순당, 알코올 제한. 저탄수화물 식단, 채소·단백질 위주 식사.

title: 트리글리세라이드 - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.
Cappuccio, F. P., D’Elia, L., Strazzullo, P., & Miller, M. A. (2010). Sleep duration and all-cause mortality. Sleep, 33(5), 585–592.
content: 유산소운동(속보, 수영, 자전거), 체지방 감소 목표.

title: 트리글리세라이드 - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.
Cappuccio, F. P., D’Elia, L., Strazzullo, P., & Miller, M. A. (2010). Sleep duration and all-cause mortality. Sleep, 33(5), 585–592.
content: 불규칙 수면·스트레스는 TG 상승 — 규칙 생활 필수.

title: 트리글리세라이드 - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.
Cappuccio, F. P., D’Elia, L., Strazzullo, P., & Miller, M. A. (2010). Sleep duration and all-cause mortality. Sleep, 33(5), 585–592.
content: 음주 중단 시 TG 수치 빠르게 개선.

title: 혈색소 - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.
Cappuccio, F. P., D’Elia, L., Strazzullo, P., & Miller, M. A. (2010). Sleep duration and all-cause mortality. Sleep, 33(5), 585–592.
content: 철분 풍부식(붉은고기, 간, 시금치), 비타민C 동시 섭취. 단, 혈색소 높을 경우 탈수 예방.

title: 혈색소 - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.
Cappuccio, F. P., D’Elia, L., Strazzullo, P., & Miller, M. A. (2010). Sleep duration and all-cause mortality. Sleep, 33(5), 585–592.
content: 가벼운 유산소로 순환 개선. 과도운동은 빈혈 악화 가능.

title: 혈색소 - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.
Cappuccio, F. P., D’Elia, L., Strazzullo, P., & Miller, M. A. (2010). Sleep duration and all-cause mortality. Sleep, 33(5), 585–592.
content: 피로·불면 시 산소공급 저하, 수면시간 확보.

title: 혈색소 - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.
Cappuccio, F. P., D’Elia, L., Strazzullo, P., & Miller, M. A. (2010). Sleep duration and all-cause mortality. Sleep, 33(5), 585–592.
content: 흡연은 혈색소 인위적 상승, 금연 권장.

title: 요단백 - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.
Cappuccio, F. P., D’Elia, L., Strazzullo, P., & Miller, M. A. (2010). Sleep duration and all-cause mortality. Sleep, 33(5), 585–592.
content: 염분·단백질 과다 제한, 수분 충분히 섭취.

title: 요단백 - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.
Cappuccio, F. P., D’Elia, L., Strazzullo, P., & Miller, M. A. (2010). Sleep duration and all-cause mortality. Sleep, 33(5), 585–592.
content: 과격운동·무산소운동 피하고, 가벼운 스트레칭 중심.

title: 요단백 - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.
Cappuccio, F. P., D’Elia, L., Strazzullo, P., & Miller, M. A. (2010). Sleep duration and all-cause mortality. Sleep, 33(5), 585–592.
content: 스트레스성 혈압상승 주의.

title: 요단백 - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.
Cappuccio, F. P., D’Elia, L., Strazzullo, P., & Miller, M. A. (2010). Sleep duration and all-cause mortality. Sleep, 33(5), 585–592.
content: 음주·흡연 모두 신장 부담 — 금주·금연.

title: AST/ALT/γ-GTP - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.
Cappuccio, F. P., D’Elia, L., Strazzullo, P., & Miller, M. A. (2010). Sleep duration and all-cause mortality. Sleep, 33(5), 585–592.
content: 기름진 음식·가공식품 제한, 채소·단백질 위주 균형식.

title: AST/ALT/γ-GTP - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.
Cappuccio, F. P., D’Elia, L., Strazzullo, P., & Miller, M. A. (2010). Sleep duration and all-cause mortality. Sleep, 33(5), 585–592.
content: 무리한 근력운동 피하고, 유산소+가벼운 근육운동 병행.

title: AST/ALT/γ-GTP - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.
Cappuccio, F. P., D’Elia, L., Strazzullo, P., & Miller, M. A. (2010). Sleep duration and all-cause mortality. Sleep, 33(5), 585–592.
content: 스트레스·수면부족 시 간 효소 상승 — 수면리듬 유지.

title: AST/ALT/γ-GTP - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.
Cappuccio, F. P., D’Elia, L., Strazzullo, P., & Miller, M. A. (2010). Sleep duration and all-cause mortality. Sleep, 33(5), 585–592.
content: 절대적 절주(또는 금주) 필수, 흡연은 간독성 악화.

title: 혈압 - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.
Cappuccio, F. P., D’Elia, L., Strazzullo, P., & Miller, M. A. (2010). Sleep duration and all-cause mortality. Sleep, 33(5), 585–592.
content: 염분(나트륨) 줄이고, 칼륨 풍부한 과일·채소 섭취. 카페인·가공식품 주의.

title: 혈압 - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.
Cappuccio, F. P., D’Elia, L., Strazzullo, P., & Miller, M. A. (2010). Sleep duration and all-cause mortality. Sleep, 33(5), 585–592.
content: 유산소운동(걷기, 자전거, 수영) 꾸준히, 격렬운동은 위험.

title: 혈압 - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.
Cappuccio, F. P., D’Elia, L., Strazzullo, P., & Miller, M. A. (2010). Sleep duration and all-cause mortality. Sleep, 33(5), 585–592.
content: 스트레스 조절(명상, 심호흡, 가벼운 산책).

title: 혈압 - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.
Cappuccio, F. P., D’Elia, L., Strazzullo, P., & Miller, M. A. (2010). Sleep duration and all-cause mortality. Sleep, 33(5), 585–592.
content: 흡연은 혈관수축, 음주는 혈압 상승 — 금연·절주 병행.

title: BMI/허리둘레 - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.
Cappuccio, F. P., D’Elia, L., Strazzullo, P., & Miller, M. A. (2010). Sleep duration and all-cause mortality. Sleep, 33(5), 585–592.
content: 소식·균형식·야식 금지. 탄수화물↓, 단백질·섬유↑.

title: BMI/허리둘레 - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.
Cappuccio, F. P., D’Elia, L., Strazzullo, P., & Miller, M. A. (2010). Sleep duration and all-cause mortality. Sleep, 33(5), 585–592.
content: 유산소+근력운동 병행, 꾸준함이 핵심.

title: BMI/허리둘레 - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.

content: 수면부족은 식욕호르몬↑ → 체중 증가, 규칙적 수면 필수.

title: BMI/허리둘레 - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.

content: 음주·흡연은 체지방·스트레스 호르몬↑ → 금연·절주.

title: eGFR 낮음 - 행동 가이드

content: 유산소운동은 가볍게, 탈수주의.

source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.
Cappuccio, F. P., D’Elia, L., Strazzullo, P., & Miller, M. A. (2010). Sleep duration and all-cause mortality. Sleep, 33(5), 585–592.

title: eGFR 낮음 - 행동 가이드
source: Kyu, H. H., Abate, D., Abate, K. H., et al. (2016). Physical activity and risk of breast cancer, colon cancer, diabetes, ischemic heart disease, and ischemic stroke. BMJ, 354, i3857.
Cappuccio, F. P., D’Elia, L., Strazzullo, P., & Miller, M. A. (2010). Sleep duration and all-cause mortality. Sleep, 33(5), 585–592.
